- Material: Tall grasses/weeds; Location: along foundation and deck edge (rear yard).  
  Observation: Overgrowth may trap moisture and harbor pests.

- Material: Wood deck boards; Location: deck surface and edge near stairs.  
  Observation: Weathered with peeling paint; potential rot or soft spots at edges.

- Material: Soil/ground cover; Location: directly against deck and siding.  
  Observation: Dense growth reduces airflow and may contribute to moisture issues.

- Material: Vegetation touching structure; Location: where grass meets deck skirt and siding.  
  Recommendation: Trim back to 12â€“18 inches from structure.

- Material: Ground grading; Location: near deck foundation.  
  Observation: No visible slope away from structure in photo; ensure drainage away from foundation.
